channel.title: AppShopper.com: "Monument Valley" Price Drop ($3.99 -> Free)
channel.description:
[quote="gcawas@gmail.com"] I used to send links like this to a little list of people I had... But it was becoming annoying as I had to go on old gmail to use it. Plus, I just realized it makes a lot more sense to use talk now!
So I just emailed them one last such email. :)
This is one of those rare awesome iPad games which are made to be somehow platform free, gameplay wise. It's also not very balanced in terms of learning curve through the levels, and **very** short for the game category - some kind of "puzzle adventure". Just reminded me of Goof Troop! :P
AppShopper is pleased to alert you of a Wish List Price Drop ($3.99 -> Free) for the “Monument Valley” App.
AppShopper: [http://appshopper.com/games/monument-valley](http://email.appshopper.com/wf/click?upn=DlW2ezZF84RRWPv27TD8Aky3LcvEo6-2B-2BxCIdUYsQpBRZ-2B-2FZkVnSmoX2t-2FV2CGufmV-2FMN8zbHY0uwHnJJi1SJzw-3D-3D_mxx8pDyL3mabOo3khlBgiBhwgYEr-2BY1NyWCo-2Fmfku19UX95GGvCOyDRWAuQEmpt6-2FxsLpx-2BPzWW0nm-2FbKgKxRcwll1hGDaZfUgae2pBbo3EBLLNW51-2BclSrEYzHTeCwD8YwtHuKMUQ2UBjiQheNAIc7fEhnCC6HP1Q0qIUifVuHtZ8YycK7g7OykMKz-2FtImw4S03mdr9Mv-2BfW482qyyu5CBjXh72T3VGTfUMnTqhs3T3pDLlZwaf-2FiheYuQAHK2r)
iTunes: [http://appshopper.com/link/monument-valley](http://email.appshopper.com/wf/click?upn=DlW2ezZF84RRWPv27TD8AnA7ClvmhL1gAmmpKNBnkJboXOaxJMSE9R-2FqPJihklJ-2F_mxx8pDyL3mabOo3khlBgiBhwgYEr-2BY1NyWCo-2Fmfku19UX95GGvCOyDRWAuQEmpt69xTa-2BmgjOdh7TrJh-2B2qAXvHB4LE4HLI-2FJXwXZI1FqxkCgP5RPrslYZ-2Be-2FUsRfwXnafLu4OO-2BYsbvHOFO9stdszbwmwX4mzHuxOTB3aLE4a7i3mqfdmDE6aqmyjnOWkg0QcFK5xJ1dH0anfImUcocGSW6kQ8rIeQ50SAQ77wxwgdI-2FmECF2pruekZB3hvW-2Flq) [/quote]
